attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its then only part of the UK to not have a national ID, its sayin they are from the north of Ireland when these British/Irish people are not and by describing it as being in the 'north of Ireland' and so by implication playing down Northern Ireland's links with Great Britain. Ulster is the Historic name of this land and is very popular. Government and cultural organizations in Northern Ireland, particularly those pre-dating the 1980s, often use the word "Ulster" in their title; for example, the University of Ulster, the Ulster Museum the Ulster Orchestra, and BBC Radio Ulster.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
